mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_his (account_his_id, account_id, amount, third_no, account_his_type) VALUES (#{accountHisId},#{accountId},#{amount},#{thirdNo},#{accountHisType})
mapper.update: UPDATE account_his set account_status = #{accountStatus},version = version + 1,before_balance = #{beforeBalance},after_balance = #{afterBalance} WHERE account_his_id = #{accountHisId} and version = #{version} and account_status = 100
mapper.select: select * from account_his where third_no = #{thirdNo} and account_id = #{accountId}
select group_concat(account_his_id) as accountHisIds,sum(amount) as sum from account_his where account_id = #{accountId} and account_status = 100 and version = 0 and amount >0
